title: How good is reaching plat 3 in my first year?
body:
Really good or just average good?
Started this season silver 3, peaked plat 3 100LP but failed promos.

replies.body: I don't think this holds weight coming from a multi season bronze
pretty good, you can probably feasibly make masters if you want without having to stop your life to do so.

never played ranked before first year?

depending on when you started and how long it took you

i'd say its really good to decently good/above adverage

Never played ranked at all.
Went into the game blind last week of July/early August of 2018. Only started playing ranked when I hit lvl 30 or 20? in October.

I started this season silver 3 and peaked at plat 3   100LP(failed plat 2 promos)

you just contradicted yourself

never played ranked
but also played ranked in oct last year

aside from that; i'd say that's pretty good

To put it in as clear wording as possible:
I picked up this game late July/early August of 2018

Was playing bots and normals until I had the levels/champs to play ranked in the fall.

Ended silver 1 my first season but could got gold if I didn't have too much schoolwork.

Started silver 3 this season and peaked plat 3 100LP

I understood that

My logic is you said a contradiction

Never playing ranked before

and playing ranked last season

are two different things

The first implies that you have had 0 previous ranked experience in any fashion, thus going in blind

the second implies you have some (if even rather minimal) previous ranked experience 

you see why I said what I did.

im not trying to be rude, or seem toxic/troll

im just going off what you have told me and deducted that there was a contradiction in your statement because they were two opposites
I mean, I did go in blind last season.
Plat 3 is probably the top ~10%-15% of the ranked playerbase.
It makes you better than 99% of this Board, if that counts for anything.
I want to say unbelievably good, but let's face it I'm just an idiotic silver pleb. The answer is probably "average" and I'm just human trash.
